donate_tips:
Open-source, built on Nostr
Non-profit, only supported by donations💗
push_notifications_tips: We employ a privacy-oriented solution for our message push notifications. Technical details can be found here:
private_messages_notifications_tips: Enable notifications for private messages and secret chat requests, without compromising the privacy of your message contents.
channels_notifications_tips: Enabling notifications for Channels will send your list of joined channels to the push server.
zaps_notifications_tips: Only Zaps that support the Nostr protocol are able to receive Zap notifications.
not_set_wallet_tips: Please set the default wallet first
sign_out_dialog_content: Make sure you've backed up your private key. Otherwise, you risk losing access to your account.
delete_account_dialog_content:
This will sign an event that deletes this account.

you will no loger be able to log into 0xchat using this account key.

Are you sure you want to continue?
delete_relay_hint: Are you sure you want to delete it? After deletion, you can connect it with the link again.
in_app_purchases_no_available: This phone does not currently support in-app purchases
unfinished_order_sos: You have an unfinished order, do you need to complete it now?
purchase_successful: Purchase successful, please check the newly acquired badge later
enter_lnurl_address_toast: Please enter the correct Lighting Address
not_allow_lnurl_tips: The LNURL does not support the Nostr protocol, unable to view transaction history
enter_ice_server_hint: Please enter the ICE server address
delete_server_tips: Are you sure you want to delete it?
